MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL72 postcode area of Moelfre. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.06PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties getting to site  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55PM on 19th March 2021.
